snippet.title: DemonStar: Secret Missions 2 (2003) - Insane Difficulty ALL Clear
snippet.description:
Old video from 2022 that I never uploaded, put them up after reading Scott Host plans to port them into SDL to help gauge more interest in Raptor Remixed Kickstarter. I never recorded Secret Missions 1 due to the issues listed in the Demonstar video description.

DemonStar: Secret Missions 2 is a sequel to Demonstar: Secret Missions 1, released in 2003 by Mountain King Studios. It's basically a standalone expansion pack with 8 new levels, graphics and music, with tweaks to the engine.

My god, this is the easiest of the entire trilogy. The game showers you with medals, which means high end score bonuses, meaning more extends than ever, it gives you a lot of power-ups and even the full power-ups, that completely annihilate the bosses if you have Magnetic Pulse. 
THE GODDAMN FINAL BOSS GIVES YOU TWO OF THOSE AND DIES LIKE A WUSS!

*misspelled in Warp as Runes

00:00 - Title Screen
00:57 - Level 01: Refueling Base
04:53 - Level 02: Ruins*
08:41 - Level 03: Omega Station
12:26 - Level 04: Ground Base
16:11 - Level 05: Bio Research Base
19:34 - Level 06: Ice Planet
23:01 - Level 07: Ceres Outpost
26:33 - Level 08: DemonStar
29:56 - Wasting Remaining Lives
30:45 - Game Overing and putting initials in
